citations.narrative:
The last documented review completed for the Contingency plan was 07/15/2023. Though an agenda for a
Safety/Security Meeting in held 2024 had bullet points for discussion of Contingency Planning, attendees and training was
not documented. Animal health may be jeopardized without contingency plan review and training.
The Contingency plan must be reviewed on at least an annual basis to ensure that it adequately addresses the required
criteria. Each licensee must maintain documentation of their annual reviews, including documenting any amendments or
changes made to their plan since the previous year's review, such as changes made as a result of recently predicted, but
historically unforeseen, circumstances (e.g., weather extremes).
Correct by: October 1, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
LYNNE WHITE-SHIM, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist n
